branding.bannerSubtext: Due to COVID-19, your doctor has developed this survey for you to complete in order to efficiently address your needs before and after your surgery in the safest possible way.
branding.thankYouTitle: Thank you for completing Dr.Salyapongse's survey.
branding.thankYouSubtext: Our team will reach out to you shortly.

sections.title: Understanding Your Availability
sections.subtext: Your doctor needs to know when you are available to get you on the schedule.

questions.prompt: When will you be available?

subsections.title: Understanding Your Day-to-Day
subsections.subtext: Your doctor wants to know about your daily living to better assess what you will need before and after your surgery.

questions.prompt: Do you currently live alone?
Will there be anyone available to help you at home at discharge?
How many hours a day will they be available to help?
On a scale of 0 to 10, with 0 meaning no pain and 10 meaning the worst pain you can imagine, how much pain have you had in your affected joint this past week?
Are you taking medication for the pain caused by your joint?
In the last month, have you had to increase your medication due to your joint pain?
Have you had any recent falls?
Have you ever been afraid that your joint might give out when you are walking?
Indicate the degree of difficulty you have experienced in the last week due to your joint while rising from sitting.
Indicate the degree of difficulty you have experienced in the last week due to your joint while bending to the floor or picking up an object.

subsections.title: Understanding Your Medical History 1
subsections.subtext: Your doctor needs to know about your health to better address your needs in and out of the operating room.

questions.prompt: What is your height?
What is your weight?
Do you smoke?
Have you ever had a Heart Attack/Myocardial Infarction (MI) or a Coronary Artery Bypass Surgery?
Do you have Atrial Fibrilation (A-Fib)?
Do you have Congestive Heart Failure (CHF)?
Do you have High Cholesterol/Lipids?
Do you have High Blood Pressure or Hypertension?
Do you have a history of a Cerebrovascular Accident (CVA) or Stroke?
Do you have Diabetes?
Are you currently taking medication for Diabetes?
Do you have a history of Pulmonary Embolism (PE), Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) or other clotting disorders?
Do you have Peripheral Vascular Disease, sores, or ulcers on your legs?
Do you have Kidney Disease/Failure?
Do you have Asthma, COPD or other breathing problems?
Do you have Sleep Apnea?

subsections.title: Understanding Your Medical History 2
subsections.subtext: Your doctor needs to know about your health to better address your needs in and out of the operating room.

questions.prompt: Have you been diagnosed with Cancer?
Are you currently undergoing treatment for Cancer?
Do you have any bleeding disorders like Hemophilia, Factor or Platelet Deficiencies, Idiopathic Thrombocytopenic Purpura (ITP) or Von Willebrand's Disease?
Do you have a form of Hyperthyroidism like Graves' disease?
Do you have a form of Hypothyroidism like Hashimoto's disease?
Do you have Hepatitis?
Do you have HIV?
Do you have a history of Urinary Tract Infections?
Do you have a history of antibiotic resistant infections (such as MRSA/MSSA)?
Have you been having issues with Dental Infections?
Do you currently have any of the following symptoms? (Check all that apply)
In the last 14 days, were you in close contact with a person who has, or is under investigation for COVID-19?
In the last 14 days, did you travel outside your home for an extended period of time?
Have you been diagnosed with COVID-19?

enums.display: Yes, I am recovered from it
